name: 羅玉潔
objective:
本課程透過分析及審視地道新聞教材如電視、網站、報紙、廣播的時事、深度報導和全球議題，加強學生英語字彙能力、聽力及寫作技巧。
The course is designed to enhance students’ overall ability in news
English vocabularies, listening and writing skills through analyzing and examining authentic news materials, such as up-to-date news stories, in-depth reports and global issues from TV, websites, newspaper and radio.
